front.title: Internet X.509 Public Key Infrastructure Extending trust in non repudiation tokens in time

abstract.t: This document describes a way to maintain the trust in a token issued by a non-repudiation Trusted Third Party (NR TTP) ( DCS/TSA/TDA ) after the key initially used to establish trust in the token expires. The document describes a general format for storage of DCS / TS / TDA tokens for this purpose .
